_meanings:
{@--5@} Weak,
feeble; {#aSiTilapariraMBa#} <ls>U. 1. 24</ls>, <ls n="U. 1.">27</ls>
'fast or close embrace'.

{@--2@} 
Slowness. ({#SiTilIkf#} means {1} to loosen,
unfasten, untie. {2} to relax, 
slacken. {3} to weaken, impair, enfeeble.
{@--4@} to give up, abandon; <ls>R. 2. 41.</ls>
{#SiTilIBU#} {1} to be slackened or 
relaxed. {2} to fall off from; <ls>Mk. 1. 13</ls>).
